item.description:
• We're bringing in the new year with some games and socializing on a lazy Sunday.  The Pats have the week off before the playoffs, so it's time for some games, coffee and conversation... what more could you ask for? :)

    Are you ready to make some new friends in the new year?  Come join us!  Bring your favorite card or board game -- they're all welcome!

    HOW TO GET THERE

    We'll be meeting at Bruegger's Bagel Bakery in Melrose. This location has nearly everything you could ask for in a location... space to play, free parking, food and drink, and not-too-crowded restrooms.

    By Subway: MBTA will be on a Sunday schedule. Make sure to check for any service advisories. Take the Orange Line to Oak Grove and take the 136 bus. This will drop you off in downtown Melrose a couple building from the event location.You can take the 137 bus back to Oak Grove.

    Bus 136 schedule: http://mbta.com/schedules_and_maps/bus/routes/?route=136
    Bus 137 schedule: http://mbta.com/schedules_and_maps/bus/routes/?route=137

    By Car: Melrose is easily accessible from Rt. 93, Rt. 1 and Rt. 28. Bruegger's is in the heart of downtown Melrose, located on Main Street. Plenty of free parking is available behind the building.
item.name: Ringing In The New Year @ Bruegger's in Melrose with Card & Conversation!
